text: Barbara Seaman (born Barbara Ann Rosner; September 11, 1935 â€“ February 27, 2008) was an American author, activist, and journalist. She was a principal founder of the women's health feminism movement. Seaman died from lung cancer in Manhattan, New York, aged 73. ==Other websites== Category:1935 births Category:2008 deaths Category:American activists Category:Journalists from New York City Category:Writers from Brooklyn Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York (state)
